if(NOT ${IREE_HAL_DRIVER_HAMMERBLADE})
  return()
endif()

iree_add_all_subdirs()

set(BLADERUNNER_DIR "$ENV{HOME}/src/bsg_bladerunner" CACHE PATH "The location of the bladerunner repository")

iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    hammerblade
  HDRS
    "api.h"
  SRCS
    "api.h"
    "hb_allocator.c"
    "hb_allocator.h"
    "hb_buffer.c"
    "hb_buffer.h"
    "hb_device.c"
    "hb_device.h"
    "hb_driver.c"
    "hb_event.c"
    "hb_event.h"
    "descriptor_set_layout.c"
    "descriptor_set_layout.h"
    "event_semaphore.c"
    "event_semaphore.h"
    "executable_layout.c"
    "executable_layout.h"
    "native_executable.c"
    "native_executable.h"
    "nop_executable_cache.c"
    "nop_executable_cache.h"
    "status_util.c"
    "status_util.h"
    "stream_command_buffer.c"
    "stream_command_buffer.h"
  DEPS
    iree::base
    iree::base::core_headers
    iree::base::internal
    iree::base::internal::arena
    iree::base::internal::flatcc
    iree::base::internal::synchronization

    iree::hal
    iree::hal::utils::deferred_command_buffer
    iree::schemas::hammerblade_executable_def_c_fbs

    "${BLADERUNNER_DIR}/bsg_replicant/libraries"

    _BSD_SOURCE
    _DEFAULT_SOURCE
    _XOPEN_SOURCE=500
  PUBLIC
)
